items.title: 'Mind-boggling' poker fraud used X-ray tables, high-tech glasses and NBA players
items.description: Prosecutors said the elaborate plot, which allegedly netted $7m from victims, belonged in a Hollywood film.

items.title: Huge noise then I yelled to get out - Louvre attendant recalls shock of heist
items.description: The attendant describes the moment thieves used an angle grinder to burst into the Gallery of Apollo.

items.title: Ecuador's president says he was target of foiled chocolate and jam poisoning
items.description: Daniel Noboa claims three highly-concentrated toxic substances were found in gifts he was given.

items.title: Slow-motion footage reveals secrets of snake bites
items.description: Scientists working out of a venom laboratory in Paris studied which snakes strike their prey fastest.

items.title: Trump says trade talks with Canada 'terminated' over anti-tariffs advert
items.description: The US president says he is axing negotiations over an advert that used Ronald Reagan speaking negatively about tariffs.
